related_questions.question: Can I really make money on Upwork?
related_questions.answer_text: Just like with any other job platform, as long as you're smart about the job search process and you know your worth and your rates, you'll be able to start using Upwork to make money in no time. If you put in the work, you might even be able to make a full-time income from Upwork.Mar 2, 2023

related_questions.question: Is Upwork good for beginners?
related_questions.answer_text: Yes, Upwork is a legitimate freelancing platform. There's no denying that Upwork is a hit ‚Äì but is it good for beginners? Yes, Upwork can be a great way to kickstart your freelancing career ‚Äì as you're able to browse millions of jobs and find the ones that are perfect for you.Sep 29, 2022

knowledge_graph.title: Upwork Inc.
knowledge_graph.subtitle: Company
knowledge_graph.description: Upwork Global Inc., formerly Elance-oDesk, is an American freelancing platform headquartered in Santa Clara and San Francisco, California. The company was formed in 2013 as Elance-oDesk, after the merger of Elance Inc. and oDesk Corp. The merged company subsequently rebranded to Upwork in 2015.

Founded:.value: December 2013, Jersey City, New Jersey, United States

Subsidiaries:.value: Upwork, Upwork Talent Group, Upwork Payments Inc., Upwork Escrow, Elance
